steps.intention: Identify the relationship between the areas of squares A, B, and C in the Pythagorean tree.
steps.note: In a Pythagorean tree, the area of the largest square (C) is the sum of the areas of the two smaller squares (A and B).

steps.intention: Calculate the area of square C using the areas of squares A and B.
